PrivacyPolicy:
Privacy Policy

Information LifeJournaler Collects

  • User Entries: Journal entries you create, update, or delete.
  • Email Address: Used for account identification and login.
  • Password: Stored in a hashed format for security.

How LifeJournaler Uses Your Data

  • Your data is used solely for providing app functionality, including allowing you to log in, access your entries, and update or delete them.

Data Sharing

  • LifeJournaler does not share your data with any third parties.

Data Storage and Protection

  • Your data is stored on a secure Oracle Cloud free-tier VM.
  • Passwords are hashed using industry-standard algorithms.
  • Database connections are always encrypted to secure your data.

User Rights

  • You have full control over your data:
    • Access and Manage Entries: You can create, update, or delete entries at any time via the app.
    • Account Deletion: You can delete your account, which will permanently erase all associated data, including your entries and email.

Data Retention

  • LifeJournaler retains your data as long as your account is active. Once you delete your account, all data, including entries and email, will be permanently erased from our database.

Cookies and Tracking

  • LifeJournaler does not use cookies or tracking technologies.

Contact Us

  • For any questions or concerns please email us at brunoeiterer@gmail.com or check out our project at github.
